mathvariant="bold-italic">σ</mi></msub></mi></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="true"><mrow></mrow></mstyle></mtd><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="true"><mrow><mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">∇</mi><mrow><msup><mi>u</mi><mi>μ</mi></msup><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">∂</mi><mi>μ</mi></msub><msup><mi>v</mi><mi>λ</mi></msup><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">∂</mi><mi>λ</mi></msub><mo>−</mo><msup><mi>v</mi><mi>μ</mi></msup><msub><mi mathvariant="bold-italic">w</mi><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>u</mi><mi>μ</mi></msup><msup><mi>v</mi><mi>λ</mi></msup><msup><mi>w</mi><mi>ρ</mi></msup><mrow><mo fence="true">(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">∂</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">Γ</mi><mi>σ</mi></msup><msub><mrow></mrow><mrow><mi>λ</mi><mi>ρ</mi></mrow></msub></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="bold-italic">σ</mi></msub></mi><mi mathvariant="normal">.</mi></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr></mtable><annotation encoding="application/x-tex"> \begin{align*} \nabla_{\boldsymbol{u}} \nabla_{\boldsymbol{v}} \boldsymbol{w} &amp;= u^{\mu} \left(\frac{\partial}{\partial x^{\mu}} (\nabla_{\boldsymbol{v}} \boldsymbol{w})^{\sigma} + (\nabla_{\boldsymbol{v}} \boldsymbol{w})^{\nu} \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\mu \nu}\right) \boldsymbol{e_{\sigma}} \\ &amp;= u^{\mu} \left(\frac{\partial}{\partial x^{\mu}} \left(v^{\lambda} \left(\frac{\partial w^{\sigma}}{\partial x^{\lambda}} + w^{\rho} \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\lambda \rho}\right)\right) + v^{\lambda} \left(\frac{\partial w^{\nu}}{\partial x^{\lambda}} + w^{\rho} \Gamma^{\nu}{}_{\lambda \rho}\right) \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\mu \nu}\right) \boldsymbol{e_{\sigma}} \\ &amp;= u^{\mu} \left(\frac{\partial v^{\lambda}}{\partial x^{\mu}} \left(\frac{\partial w^{\sigma}}{\partial x^{\lambda}} + w^{\rho} \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\lambda \rho}\right) + v^{\lambda} \frac{\partial}{\partial x^{\mu}} \left(\frac{\partial w^{\sigma}}{\partial x^{\lambda}} + w^{\rho} \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\lambda \rho}\right) + v^{\lambda} \left(\frac{\partial w^{\nu}}{\partial x^{\lambda}} + w^{\rho} \Gamma^{\nu}{}_{\lambda \rho}\right) \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\mu \nu}\right) \boldsymbol{e_{\sigma}} \\ &amp;= u^{\mu} \left(\frac{\partial v^{\lambda}}{\partial x^{\mu}} \frac{\partial w^{\sigma}}{\partial x^{\lambda}} + \frac{\partial v^{\lambda}}{\partial x^{\mu}} w^{\rho} \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\lambda \rho} + v^{\lambda} \frac{\partial^2 w^{\sigma}}{\partial x^{\mu} \partial x^{\lambda}} + v^{\lambda} \frac{\partial}{\partial x^{\mu}} \left(w^{\rho} \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\lambda \rho}\right) + v^{\lambda} \frac{\partial w^{\nu}}{\partial x^{\lambda}} \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\mu \nu} + v^{\lambda} w^{\rho} \Gamma^{\nu}{}_{\lambda \rho} \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\mu \nu}\right) \boldsymbol{e_{\sigma}} \\ &amp;= u^{\mu} \left(\frac{\partial v^{\lambda}}{\partial x^{\mu}} \frac{\partial w^{\sigma}}{\partial x^{\lambda}} + \frac{\partial v^{\lambda}}{\partial x^{\mu}} w^{\rho} \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\lambda \rho} + v^{\lambda} \frac{\partial^2 w^{\sigma}}{\partial x^{\mu} \partial x^{\lambda}} + v^{\lambda} \frac{\partial w^{\rho}}{\partial x^{\mu}} \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\lambda \rho} + v^{\lambda} w^{\rho} \frac{\partial \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\lambda \rho}}{\partial x^{\mu}} + v^{\lambda} \frac{\partial w^{\nu}}{\partial x^{\lambda}} \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\mu \nu} + v^{\lambda} w^{\rho} \Gamma^{\nu}{}_{\lambda \rho} \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\mu \nu}\right) \boldsymbol{e_{\sigma}} \\ &amp;= \left(u^{\mu} \frac{\partial v^{\lambda}}{\partial x^{\mu}} \frac{\partial w^{\sigma}}{\partial x^{\lambda}} + u^{\mu} \frac{\partial v^{\lambda}}{\partial x^{\mu}} w^{\rho} \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\lambda \rho} + u^{\mu} v^{\lambda} \frac{\partial^2 w^{\sigma}}{\partial x^{\mu} \partial x^{\lambda}} + u^{\mu} v^{\lambda} \frac{\partial w^{\rho}}{\partial x^{\mu}} \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\lambda \rho} + u^{\mu} v^{\lambda} w^{\rho} \frac{\partial \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\lambda \rho}}{\partial x^{\mu}} + u^{\mu} v^{\lambda} \frac{\partial w^{\nu}}{\partial x^{\lambda}} \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\mu \nu} + u^{\mu} v^{\lambda} w^{\rho} \Gamma^{\nu}{}_{\lambda \rho} \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\mu \nu}\right) \boldsymbol{e_{\sigma}} \\ \nabla_{\boldsymbol{v}} \nabla_{\boldsymbol{u}} \boldsymbol{w} &amp;= \left(v^{\mu} \frac{\partial u^{\lambda}}{\partial x^{\mu}} \frac{\partial w^{\sigma}}{\partial x^{\lambda}} + v^{\mu} \frac{\partial u^{\lambda}}{\partial x^{\mu}} w^{\rho} \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\lambda \rho} + v^{\mu} u^{\lambda} \frac{\partial^2 w^{\sigma}}{\partial x^{\mu} \partial x^{\lambda}} + v^{\mu} u^{\lambda} \frac{\partial w^{\rho}}{\partial x^{\mu}} \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\lambda \rho} + v^{\mu} u^{\lambda} w^{\rho} \frac{\partial \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\lambda \rho}}{\partial x^{\mu}} + v^{\mu} u^{\lambda} \frac{\partial w^{\nu}}{\partial x^{\lambda}} \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\mu \nu} + v^{\mu} u^{\lambda} w^{\rho} \Gamma^{\nu}{}_{\lambda \rho} \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\mu \nu}\right) \boldsymbol{e_{\sigma}} \\ [\nabla_{\boldsymbol{u}}, \nabla_{\boldsymbol{v}}] \boldsymbol{w} &amp;= \Big(u^{\mu} \frac{\partial v^{\lambda}}{\partial x^{\mu}} \frac{\partial w^{\sigma}}{\partial x^{\lambda}} + u^{\mu} \frac{\partial v^{\lambda}}{\partial x^{\mu}} w^{\rho} \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\lambda \rho} + u^{\mu} v^{\lambda} \frac{\partial^2 w^{\sigma}}{\partial x^{\mu} \partial x^{\lambda}} + u^{\mu} v^{\lambda} \frac{\partial w^{\rho}}{\partial x^{\mu}} \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\lambda \rho} + u^{\mu} v^{\lambda} w^{\rho} \frac{\partial \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\lambda \rho}}{\partial x^{\mu}} + u^{\mu} v^{\lambda} \frac{\partial w^{\nu}}{\partial x^{\lambda}} \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\mu \nu} + u^{\mu} v^{\lambda} w^{\rho} \Gamma^{\nu}{}_{\lambda \rho} \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\mu \nu} \\ &amp;- v^{\mu} \frac{\partial u^{\lambda}}{\partial x^{\mu}} \frac{\partial w^{\sigma}}{\partial x^{\lambda}} - v^{\mu} \frac{\partial u^{\lambda}}{\partial x^{\mu}} w^{\rho} \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\lambda \rho} - v^{\mu} u^{\lambda} \frac{\partial^2 w^{\sigma}}{\partial x^{\mu} \partial x^{\lambda}} - v^{\mu} u^{\lambda} \frac{\partial w^{\rho}}{\partial x^{\mu}} \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\lambda \rho} - v^{\mu} u^{\lambda} w^{\rho} \frac{\partial \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\lambda \rho}}{\partial x^{\mu}} - v^{\mu} u^{\lambda} \frac{\partial w^{\nu}}{\partial x^{\lambda}} \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\mu \nu} - v^{\mu} u^{\lambda} w^{\rho} \Gamma^{\nu}{}_{\lambda \rho} \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\mu \nu}\Big) \boldsymbol{e_{\sigma}} \\ &amp;= \Big(u^{\mu} \frac{\partial v^{\lambda}}{\partial x^{\mu}} \frac{\partial w^{\sigma}}{\partial x^{\lambda}} + u^{\mu} \frac{\partial v^{\lambda}}{\partial x^{\mu}} w^{\rho} \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\lambda \rho} + u^{\mu} v^{\lambda} \frac{\partial^2 w^{\sigma}}{\partial x^{\mu} \partial x^{\lambda}} + u^{\mu} v^{\lambda} \frac{\partial w^{\rho}}{\partial x^{\mu}} \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\lambda \rho} + u^{\mu} v^{\lambda} w^{\rho} \frac{\partial \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\lambda \rho}}{\partial x^{\mu}} + u^{\mu} v^{\lambda} \frac{\partial w^{\nu}}{\partial x^{\lambda}} \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\mu \nu} + u^{\mu} v^{\lambda} w^{\rho} \Gamma^{\nu}{}_{\lambda \rho} \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\mu \nu} \\ &amp;- v^{\mu} \frac{\partial u^{\lambda}}{\partial x^{\mu}} \frac{\partial w^{\sigma}}{\partial x^{\lambda}} - v^{\mu} \frac{\partial u^{\lambda}}{\partial x^{\mu}} w^{\rho} \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\lambda \rho} - v^{\lambda} u^{\mu} \frac{\partial^2 w^{\sigma}}{\partial x^{\lambda} \partial x^{\mu}} - v^{\lambda} u^{\mu} \frac{\partial w^{\nu}}{\partial x^{\lambda}} \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\mu \nu} - v^{\mu} u^{\lambda} w^{\rho} \frac{\partial \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\lambda \rho}}{\partial x^{\mu}} - v^{\lambda} u^{\mu} \frac{\partial w^{\rho}}{\partial x^{\mu}} \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\lambda \rho} - v^{\mu} u^{\lambda} w^{\rho} \Gamma^{\nu}{}_{\lambda \rho} \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\mu \nu}\Big) \boldsymbol{e_{\sigma}} \\ &amp;= \Big(u^{\mu} \frac{\partial v^{\lambda}}{\partial x^{\mu}} \frac{\partial w^{\sigma}}{\partial x^{\lambda}} + u^{\mu} w^{\rho} \frac{\partial v^{\lambda}}{\partial x^{\mu}} \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\lambda \rho} + u^{\mu} w^{\rho} v^{\lambda} \frac{\partial \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\lambda \rho}}{\partial x^{\mu}} + u^{\mu} v^{\lambda} w^{\rho} \Gamma^{\nu}{}_{\lambda \rho} \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\mu \nu} \\ &amp;- v^{\mu} \frac{\partial u^{\lambda}}{\partial x^{\mu}} \frac{\partial w^{\sigma}}{\partial x^{\lambda}} - v^{\mu} w^{\rho} \frac{\partial u^{\lambda}}{\partial x^{\mu}} \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\lambda \rho} - v^{\mu} w^{\rho} u^{\lambda} \frac{\partial \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\lambda \rho}}{\partial x^{\mu}} - u^{\lambda} v^{\mu} w^{\rho} \Gamma^{\nu}{}_{\lambda \rho} \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\mu \nu}\Big) \boldsymbol{e_{\sigma}} \\ &amp;= \Big(u^{\mu} \frac{\partial v^{\lambda}}{\partial x^{\mu}} \frac{\partial w^{\sigma}}{\partial x^{\lambda}} + u^{\mu} w^{\rho} \frac{\partial v^{\lambda}}{\partial x^{\mu}} \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\lambda \rho} + u^{\mu} v^{\lambda} w^{\rho} \frac{\partial \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\lambda \rho}}{\partial x^{\mu}} + u^{\mu} v^{\lambda} w^{\rho} \Gamma^{\nu}{}_{\lambda \rho} \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\mu \nu} \\ &amp;- v^{\mu} \frac{\partial u^{\lambda}}{\partial x^{\mu}} \frac{\partial w^{\sigma}}{\partial x^{\lambda}} - v^{\mu} w^{\rho} \frac{\partial u^{\lambda}}{\partial x^{\mu}} \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\lambda \rho} - u^{\mu} v^{\lambda} w^{\rho} \frac{\partial \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\mu \rho}}{\partial x^{\lambda}} - u^{\mu} v^{\lambda} w^{\rho} \Gamma^{\nu}{}_{\mu \rho} \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\lambda \nu}\Big) \boldsymbol{e_{\sigma}} \\ &amp;= u^{\mu} \frac{\partial v^{\lambda}}{\partial x^{\mu}} \left(\frac{\partial w^{\sigma}}{\partial x^{\lambda}} + w^{\rho} \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\lambda \rho}\right) \boldsymbol{e_{\sigma}} - v^{\mu} \frac{\partial u^{\lambda}}{\partial x^{\mu}} \left(\frac{\partial w^{\sigma}}{\partial x^{\lambda}} + w^{\rho} \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\lambda \rho}\right) \boldsymbol{e_{\sigma}} + u^{\mu} v^{\lambda} w^{\rho} \left(\frac{\partial \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\lambda \rho}}{\partial x^{\mu}} - \frac{\partial \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\mu \rho}}{\partial x^{\lambda}} + \Gamma^{\nu}{}_{\lambda \rho} \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\mu \nu} - \Gamma^{\nu}{}_{\mu \rho} \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\lambda \nu}\right) \boldsymbol{e_{\sigma}} \\ &amp;= \left(\frac{\partial v^{\lambda}}{\partial x^{\mu}} u^{\mu} - v^{\mu} \frac{\partial u^{\lambda}}{\partial x^{\mu}}\right) \left(\frac{\partial w^{\sigma}}{\partial x^{\lambda}} + w^{\rho} \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\lambda \rho}\right) \boldsymbol{e_{\sigma}} + u^{\mu} v^{\lambda} w^{\rho} \left(\frac{\partial \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\lambda \rho}}{\partial x^{\mu}} - \frac{\partial \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\mu \rho}}{\partial x^{\lambda}} + \Gamma^{\nu}{}_{\lambda \rho} \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\mu \nu} - \Gamma^{\nu}{}_{\mu \rho} \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\lambda \nu}\right) \boldsymbol{e_{\sigma}} \\ &amp;= \left(\frac{\partial v^{\lambda}}{\partial x^{\mu}} u^{\mu} - v^{\mu} \frac{\partial u^{\lambda}}{\partial x^{\mu}}\right) \nabla_{\boldsymbol{e_{\lambda}}} \boldsymbol{w} + u^{\mu} v^{\lambda} w^{\rho} \left(\frac{\partial \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\lambda \rho}}{\partial x^{\mu}} - \frac{\partial \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\mu \rho}}{\partial x^{\lambda}} + \Gamma^{\nu}{}_{\lambda \rho} \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\mu \nu} - \Gamma^{\nu}{}_{\mu \rho} \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\lambda \nu}\right) \boldsymbol{e_{\sigma}} \\ &amp;= (u^{\mu} \partial_{\mu} v^{\lambda} - v^{\mu} \partial_{\mu} u^{\lambda}) \nabla_{\boldsymbol{e_{\lambda}}} \boldsymbol{w} + u^{\mu} v^{\lambda} w^{\rho} \left(\frac{\partial \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\lambda \rho}}{\partial x^{\mu}} - \frac{\partial \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\mu \rho}}{\partial x^{\lambda}} + \Gamma^{\nu}{}_{\lambda \rho} \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\mu \nu} - \Gamma^{\nu}{}_{\mu \rho} \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\lambda \nu}\right) \boldsymbol{e_{\sigma}} \\ &amp;= \nabla_{u^{\mu} \partial_{\mu} v^{\lambda} \partial_{\lambda} - v^{\mu} \partial_{\mu} u^{\lambda} \partial_{\lambda}} \boldsymbol{w} + u^{\mu} v^{\lambda} w^{\rho} \left(\frac{\partial \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\lambda \rho}}{\partial x^{\mu}} - \frac{\partial \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\mu \rho}}{\partial x^{\lambda}} + \Gamma^{\nu}{}_{\lambda \rho} \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\mu \nu} - \Gamma^{\nu}{}_{\mu \rho} \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\lambda \nu}\right) \boldsymbol{e_{\sigma}}. \end{align*} </annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="katex-html" aria-hidden="true"><span [\nabla_{\boldsymbol{u}}, \nabla_{\boldsymbol{v}}] \boldsymbol{w} - \nabla_{[\boldsymbol{u}, \boldsymbol{v}]} \boldsymbol{w} \\ &amp;= \nabla_{\boldsymbol{u}} \nabla_{\boldsymbol{v}} \boldsymbol{w} - separator="true">,</mo></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="true"><mrow><msup><mi>R</mi><mi>σ</mi></msup><msub><mrow></mrow><mrow><mi>γ</mi><mi>α</mi><mi>β</mi></mrow></msub><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>R</mi><mi>σ</mi></msup><msub><mrow></mrow><mrow><mi>β</mi><mi>γ</mi><mi>α</mi></mrow></msub><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>R</mi><mi>σ</mi></msup><msub><mrow></mrow><mrow><mi>α</mi><mi>β</mi><mi>γ</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></mtd><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="true"><mrow><mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo separator="true">,</mo></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr></mtable><annotation encoding="application/x-tex"> \begin{align*} R(\boldsymbol{e_{\alpha}}, \boldsymbol{e_{\beta}}) \boldsymbol{e_{\gamma}} + R(\boldsymbol{e_{\gamma}}, \boldsymbol{e_{\alpha}}) \boldsymbol{e_{\beta}} + R(\boldsymbol{e_{\beta}}, \boldsymbol{e_{\gamma}}) \boldsymbol{e_{\alpha}} &amp;= \nabla_{\boldsymbol{e_{\alpha}}} \nabla_{\boldsymbol{e_{\beta}}} \boldsymbol{e_{\gamma}} - \nabla_{\boldsymbol{e_{\beta}}} \nabla_{\boldsymbol{e_{\alpha}}} \boldsymbol{e_{\gamma}} \\ &amp;+ \nabla_{\boldsymbol{e_{\gamma}}} \nabla_{\boldsymbol{e_{\alpha}}} \boldsymbol{e_{\beta}} - \nabla_{\boldsymbol{e_{\alpha}}} \nabla_{\boldsymbol{e_{\gamma}}} \boldsymbol{e_{\beta}} \\ &amp;+ \nabla_{\boldsymbol{e_{\beta}}} \nabla_{\boldsymbol{e_{\gamma}}} \boldsymbol{e_{\alpha}} - \nabla_{\boldsymbol{e_{\gamma}}} \nabla_{\boldsymbol{e_{\beta}}} \boldsymbol{e_{\alpha}} \\ &amp;= \nabla_{\boldsymbol{e_{\alpha}}} \nabla_{\boldsymbol{e_{\beta}}} \boldsymbol{e_{\gamma}} - \nabla_{\boldsymbol{e_{\beta}}} \nabla_{\boldsymbol{e_{\gamma}}} \boldsymbol{e_{\alpha}} \\ &amp;+ \nabla_{\boldsymbol{e_{\gamma}}} \nabla_{\boldsymbol{e_{\alpha}}} \boldsymbol{e_{\beta}} - \nabla_{\boldsymbol{e_{\alpha}}} \nabla_{\boldsymbol{e_{\beta}}} \boldsymbol{e_{\gamma}} \\ &amp;+ \nabla_{\boldsymbol{e_{\beta}}} \nabla_{\boldsymbol{e_{\gamma}}} \boldsymbol{e_{\alpha}} - \nabla_{\boldsymbol{e_{\gamma}}} \nabla_{\boldsymbol{e_{\alpha}}} \boldsymbol{e_{\beta}} \\ &amp;= \boldsymbol{0}, \\ R^{\sigma}{}_{\gamma \alpha \beta} + R^{\sigma}{}_{\beta \gamma \alpha} + R^{\sigma}{}_{\alpha \beta \gamma} &amp;= 0, \end{align*} </annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="katex-html" aria-hidden="true"><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height:12em;vertical-align:-5.75em;"></span><span class="mord"><span class="mtable"><span class="col-align-r"><span class="vlist-t vlist-t2"><span class="vlist-r"><span class="vlist" style="height:6.25em;"><span style="top:-8.41em;"><span class="pstrut" style="height:3em;"></span><span class="mord"><span class="mord mathnormal" style="margin-right:0.00773em;">R</span><span class="mopen">(</span><span class="mord"><span class="mord"><span class="mord"><span class="mord boldsymbol">e</span><span class="msupsub"><span class="vlist-t vlist-t2"><span class="vlist-r"><span class="vlist" style="height:0.1611em;"><span style="top:-2.55em;margin-left:0em;margin-right:0.05em;"><span class="pstrut" style="height:2.7em;"></span><span class="sizing reset-size6 size3 mtight"><span class="mord mtight"><span class="mord boldsymbol mtight">α</span></span></span></span></span><span class="vlist-s">​</span></span><span class="vlist-r"><span class="vlist" style="height:0.15em;"><span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mpunct">,</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right:0.1667em;"></span><span class="mord"><span class="mord"><span class="mord"><span class="mord boldsymbol">e</span><span class="msupsub"><span class="vlist-t vlist-t2"><span class="vlist-r"><span class="vlist" style="height:0.3361em;"><span mathvariant="normal">∇</mi><mi><msub><mi mathvariant="bold-italic">e</mi><mi mathvariant="bold-italic">μ</mi></msub></mi></msub><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">∇</mi><mi><msub><mi mathvariant="bold-italic">e</mi><mi mathvariant="bold-italic">λ</mi></msub></mi></msub><mi mathvariant="bold-italic">v</mi><mo>−</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">∇</mi><mi><msub><mi mathvariant="bold-italic">e</mi><mi mathvariant="bold-italic">λ</mi></msub></mi></msub><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">∇</mi><mi><msub><mi mathvariant="bold-italic">e</mi><mi mathvariant="bold-italic">μ</mi></msub></mi></msub><mi mathvariant="bold-italic">v</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="true"><mrow></mrow></mstyle></mtd><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="true"><mrow><mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi>R</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi><msub><mi mathvariant="bold-italic">e</mi><mi mathvariant="bold-italic">μ</mi></msub></mi><mo separator="true">,</mo><mi><msub><mi mathvariant="bold-italic">e</mi><mi mathvariant="bold-italic">λ</mi></msub></mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mi mathvariant="bold-italic">u</mi><mo>⋅</mo><mi mathvariant="bold-italic">v</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="bold-italic">u</mi><mo>⋅</mo><mi>R</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi><msub><mi mathvariant="bold-italic">e</mi><mi mathvariant="bold-italic">μ</mi></msub></mi><mo separator="true">,</mo><mi><msub><mi mathvariant="bold-italic">e</mi><mi mathvariant="bold-italic">λ</mi></msub></mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mi mathvariant="bold-italic">v</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">.</mi></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr></mtable><annotation encoding="application/x-tex"> \begin{align*} R(\boldsymbol{e_{\mu}}, \boldsymbol{e_{\lambda}})(\boldsymbol{u} \cdot \boldsymbol{v}) &amp;= \nabla_{\boldsymbol{e_{\mu}}} \nabla_{\boldsymbol{e_{\lambda}}}(\boldsymbol{u} \cdot \boldsymbol{v}) - \nabla_{\boldsymbol{e_{\lambda}}} \nabla_{\boldsymbol{e_{\mu}}}(\boldsymbol{u} \cdot \boldsymbol{v}) \\ &amp;= \nabla_{\boldsymbol{e_{\mu}}} (\nabla_{\boldsymbol{e_{\lambda}}} \boldsymbol{u} \cdot \boldsymbol{v} + \boldsymbol{u} \cdot \nabla_{\boldsymbol{e_{\lambda}}} \boldsymbol{v}) - \nabla_{\boldsymbol{e_{\lambda}}} (\nabla_{\boldsymbol{e_{\mu}}} \boldsymbol{u} \cdot \boldsymbol{v} + \boldsymbol{u} \cdot \nabla_{\boldsymbol{e_{\mu}}} \boldsymbol{v}) \\ &amp;= \nabla_{\boldsymbol{e_{\mu}}} (\nabla_{\boldsymbol{e_{\lambda}}} \boldsymbol{u} \cdot \boldsymbol{v}) + \nabla_{\boldsymbol{e_{\mu}}} (\boldsymbol{u} \cdot \nabla_{\boldsymbol{e_{\lambda}}} \boldsymbol{v}) - \nabla_{\boldsymbol{e_{\lambda}}} (\nabla_{\boldsymbol{e_{\mu}}} \boldsymbol{u} \cdot \boldsymbol{v}) - \nabla_{\boldsymbol{e_{\lambda}}} (\boldsymbol{u} \cdot \nabla_{\boldsymbol{e_{\mu}}} \boldsymbol{v}) \\ &amp;= \nabla_{\boldsymbol{e_{\mu}}} \nabla_{\boldsymbol{e_{\lambda}}} \boldsymbol{u} \cdot \boldsymbol{v} + \nabla_{\boldsymbol{e_{\lambda}}} \boldsymbol{u} \cdot \nabla_{\boldsymbol{e_{\mu}}} \boldsymbol{v} + \nabla_{\boldsymbol{e_{\mu}}} \boldsymbol{u} \cdot \nabla_{\boldsymbol{e_{\lambda}}} \boldsymbol{v} + \boldsymbol{u} \cdot \nabla_{\boldsymbol{e_{\mu}}} \nabla_{\boldsymbol{e_{\lambda}}} \boldsymbol{v} \\ &amp;- \nabla_{\boldsymbol{e_{\lambda}}} \nabla_{\boldsymbol{e_{\mu}}} \boldsymbol{u} \cdot \boldsymbol{v} - \nabla_{\boldsymbol{e_{\mu}}} \boldsymbol{u} \cdot \nabla_{\boldsymbol{e_{\lambda}}} \boldsymbol{v} - \nabla_{\boldsymbol{e_{\lambda}}} \boldsymbol{u} \cdot \nabla_{\boldsymbol{e_{\mu}}} \boldsymbol{v} - \boldsymbol{u} \cdot \nabla_{\boldsymbol{e_{\lambda}}} \nabla_{\boldsymbol{e_{\mu}}} \boldsymbol{v} \\ &amp;= \nabla_{\boldsymbol{e_{\mu}}} \nabla_{\boldsymbol{e_{\lambda}}} \boldsymbol{u} \cdot \boldsymbol{v} - \nabla_{\boldsymbol{e_{\lambda}}} \nabla_{\boldsymbol{e_{\mu}}} \boldsymbol{u} \cdot \boldsymbol{v} + \boldsymbol{u} \cdot \nabla_{\boldsymbol{e_{\mu}}} \nabla_{\boldsymbol{e_{\lambda}}} \boldsymbol{v} - \boldsymbol{u} \cdot \nabla_{\boldsymbol{e_{\lambda}}} \nabla_{\boldsymbol{e_{\mu}}} \boldsymbol{v} \\ &amp;= (\nabla_{\boldsymbol{e_{\mu}}} \nabla_{\boldsymbol{e_{\lambda}}} \boldsymbol{u} - \nabla_{\boldsymbol{e_{\lambda}}} \nabla_{\boldsymbol{e_{\mu}}} \boldsymbol{u}) \cdot \boldsymbol{v} + \boldsymbol{u} \cdot (\nabla_{\boldsymbol{e_{\mu}}} \nabla_{\boldsymbol{e_{\lambda}}} \boldsymbol{v} - \nabla_{\boldsymbol{e_{\lambda}}} \nabla_{\boldsymbol{e_{\mu}}} \boldsymbol{v}) \\ &amp;= R(\boldsymbol{e_{\mu}}, \boldsymbol{e_{\lambda}})\boldsymbol{u} \cdot \boldsymbol{v} + \boldsymbol{u} \cdot R(\boldsymbol{e_{\mu}}, \boldsymbol{e_{\lambda}})\boldsymbol{v}. \end{align*} </annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="katex-html" aria-hidden="true"><span class="base"><span class="strut" mathvariant="bold-italic">v</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="true"><mrow></mrow></mstyle></mtd><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="true"><mrow><mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0.</mn></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr></mtable><annotation encoding="application/x-tex"> \begin{align*} R(\boldsymbol{e_{\mu}}, \boldsymbol{e_{\lambda}})(\boldsymbol{u} \cdot \boldsymbol{v}) &amp;= \nabla_{\boldsymbol{e_{\mu}}} \nabla_{\boldsymbol{e_{\lambda}}}(\boldsymbol{u} \cdot \boldsymbol{v}) - \nabla_{\boldsymbol{e_{\lambda}}} \nabla_{\boldsymbol{e_{\mu}}}(\boldsymbol{u} \cdot \boldsymbol{v}) \\ &amp;= \frac{\partial}{\partial x^{\mu}} \frac{\partial}{\partial x^{\lambda}} (\boldsymbol{u} \cdot \boldsymbol{v}) - \frac{\partial}{\partial x^{\lambda}} \frac{\partial}{\partial x^{\mu}} (\boldsymbol{u} \cdot \boldsymbol{v}) \\ &amp;= 0. \end{align*} </annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="katex-html" aria-hidden="true"><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height:5.3574em;vertical-align:-2.4287em;"></span><span class="mord"><span class="mtable"><span class="col-align-r"><span class="vlist-t vlist-t2"><span class="vlist-r"><span class="vlist" style="height:2.9287em;"><span style="top:-5.4602em;"><span mathvariant="bold-italic">α</mi></msub></mi><mo>⋅</mo><msup><mi>R</mi><mi>σ</mi></msup><msub><mrow></mrow><mrow><mi>β</mi><mi>μ</mi><mi>λ</mi></mrow></msub><mi><msub><mi mathvariant="bold-italic">e</mi><mi mathvariant="bold-italic">σ</mi></msub></mi></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="true"><mrow></mrow></mstyle></mtd><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="true"><mrow><mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>R</mi><mi>σ</mi></msup><msub><mrow></mrow><mrow><mi>α</mi><mi>μ</mi><mi>λ</mi></mrow></msub><msub><mi>g</mi><mrow><mi>σ</mi><mi>β</mi></mrow></msub><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>R</mi><mi>σ</mi></msup><msub><mrow></mrow><mrow><mi>β</mi><mi>μ</mi><mi>λ</mi></mrow></msub><msub><mi>g</mi><mrow><mi>α</mi><mi>σ</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="true"><mrow></mrow></mstyle></mtd><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="true"><mrow><mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>R</mi><mrow><mi>β</mi><mi>α</mi><mi>μ</mi><mi>λ</mi></mrow></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>R</mi><mrow><mi>α</mi><mi>β</mi><mi>μ</mi><mi>λ</mi></mrow></msub><mo separator="true">,</mo></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>R</mi><mrow><mi>β</mi><mi>α</mi><mi>μ</mi><mi>λ</mi></mrow></msub></mstyle></mtd><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="true"><mrow><mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><msub><mi>R</mi><mrow><mi>α</mi><mi>β</mi><mi>μ</mi><mi>λ</mi></mrow></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">.</mi></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr></mtable><annotation encoding="application/x-tex"> \begin{align*} R(\boldsymbol{e_{\mu}}, \boldsymbol{e_{\lambda}})(\boldsymbol{e_{\alpha}} \cdot \boldsymbol{e_{\beta}}) = 0 &amp;= R(\boldsymbol{e_{\mu}}, \boldsymbol{e_{\lambda}})\boldsymbol{e_{\alpha}} \cdot \boldsymbol{e_{\beta}} + \boldsymbol{e_{\alpha}} \cdot R(\boldsymbol{e_{\mu}}, \boldsymbol{e_{\lambda}})\boldsymbol{e_{\beta}} \\ &amp;= R^{\sigma}{}_{\alpha \mu \lambda} \boldsymbol{e_{\sigma}} \cdot \boldsymbol{e_{\beta}} + \boldsymbol{e_{\alpha}} \cdot R^{\sigma}{}_{\beta \mu \lambda} \boldsymbol{e_{\sigma}} \\ &amp;= R^{\sigma}{}_{\alpha \mu \lambda} g_{\sigma \beta} + R^{\sigma}{}_{\beta \mu \lambda} g_{\alpha \sigma} \\ &amp;= R_{\beta \alpha \mu \lambda} + R_{\alpha \beta \mu \lambda}, \\ R_{\beta \alpha \mu \lambda} &amp;= -R_{\alpha \beta \mu \lambda}. \end{align*} </annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="katex-html" aria-hidden="true"><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height:7.5em;vertical-align:-3.5em;"></span><span class="mord"><span class="mtable"><span class="col-align-r"><span class="vlist-t vlist-t2"><span scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="true"><mrow></mrow></mstyle></mtd><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="true"><mrow><mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><msub><mi>R</mi><mrow><mi>α</mi><mi>β</mi><mi>σ</mi><mi>γ</mi></mrow></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mi>R</mi><mrow><mi>σ</mi><mi>γ</mi><mi>α</mi><mi>β</mi></mrow></msub><mo separator="true">,</mo></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="true"><mrow><mn>2</mn><msub><mi>R</mi><mrow><mi>σ</mi><mi>γ</mi><mi>α</mi><mi>β</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></mtd><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="true"><mrow><mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><msub><mi>R</mi><mrow><mi>α</mi><mi>β</mi><mi>σ</mi><mi>γ</mi></mrow></msub><mo separator="true">,</mo></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>R</mi><mrow><mi>σ</mi><mi>γ</mi><mi>α</mi><mi>β</mi></mrow></msub></mstyle></mtd><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="true"><mrow><mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>R</mi><mrow><mi>α</mi><mi>β</mi><mi>σ</mi><mi>γ</mi></mrow></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">.</mi></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr></mtable><annotation encoding="application/x-tex"> \begin{align*} R_{\sigma \gamma \alpha \beta} &amp;= - R_{\beta \alpha \sigma \gamma} - R_{\beta \gamma \alpha \sigma} - R_{\alpha \gamma \sigma \beta} - R_{\alpha \beta \gamma \sigma} \\ &amp;= R_{\alpha \beta \sigma \gamma} + R_{\gamma \beta \alpha \sigma} + R_{\gamma \alpha \sigma \beta} + R_{\alpha \beta \sigma \gamma} \\ &amp;= 2 R_{\alpha \beta \sigma \gamma} - (-R_{\gamma \beta \alpha \sigma} - R_{\gamma \alpha \sigma \beta}) \\ &amp;= 2 R_{\alpha \beta \sigma \gamma} - R_{\gamma \sigma \beta \alpha} \\ &amp;= 2 R_{\alpha \beta \sigma \gamma} - R_{\sigma \gamma \alpha \beta}, \\ 2 R_{\sigma \gamma \alpha \beta} &amp;= 2 R_{\alpha \beta \sigma \gamma}, \\ R_{\sigma \gamma \alpha \beta} &amp;= R_{\alpha \beta \sigma \gamma}. \\ \end{align*} </annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="katex-html" aria-hidden="true"><span class="base"><span class="strut" \begin{align*} g_{\mu \nu} &amp;= \begin{bmatrix} r^2 &amp; 0 \\ 0   &amp; r^2 \sin^2 \theta \end{bmatrix}, \\ g^{\mu \nu} &amp;= \begin{bmatrix} \frac{1}{r^2} &amp; 0 \\ 0             &amp; \frac{1}{r^2 \sin^2 \theta} \end{bmatrix}, \\ \Gamma^{\theta}{}_{\phi \phi} &amp;= - \frac{1}{2} \sin (2 \theta), \\ \Gamma^{\phi}{}_{\theta \phi} = \Gamma^{\phi}{}_{\phi \theta} &amp;= \cot \theta. \end{align*} </annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="katex-html" aria-hidden="true"><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height:9.3086em;vertical-align:-4.4043em;"></span><span stretchy="false">(</mo><msup><mrow><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mi>θ</mi><mo>−</mo><msup><mrow><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mi>θ</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mi>θ</mi><mo fence="true">)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="true"><mrow><mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mrow><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mi>θ</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">.</mi></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr></mtable><annotation encoding="application/x-tex"> \begin{align*} R_{\theta \phi \theta \phi} = g_{\theta \sigma} R^{\sigma}{}_{\phi \theta \phi} &amp;= g_{\theta \sigma} (\Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\phi \phi, \theta} - \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\theta \phi, \phi} + \Gamma^{\nu}{}_{\phi \phi} \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\theta \nu} - \Gamma^{\nu}{}_{\theta \phi} \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\phi \nu}) \\ &amp;= g_{\theta \theta} (\Gamma^{\theta}{}_{\phi \phi, \theta} - \Gamma^{\theta}{}_{\theta \phi, \phi} + \Gamma^{\nu}{}_{\phi \phi} \Gamma^{\theta}{}_{\theta \nu} - \Gamma^{\nu}{}_{\theta \phi} \Gamma^{\theta}{}_{\phi \nu}) \\ &amp;= g_{\theta \theta} (\Gamma^{\theta}{}_{\phi \phi, \theta} + \Gamma^{\theta}{}_{\phi \phi} \Gamma^{\theta}{}_{\theta \theta} + \Gamma^{\phi}{}_{\phi \phi} \Gamma^{\theta}{}_{\theta \phi} - \Gamma^{\theta}{}_{\theta \phi} \Gamma^{\theta}{}_{\phi \theta} - \Gamma^{\phi}{}_{\theta \phi} \Gamma^{\theta}{}_{\phi \phi}) \\ &amp;= g_{\theta \theta} (\Gamma^{\theta}{}_{\phi \phi, \theta} - \Gamma^{\phi}{}_{\theta \phi} \Gamma^{\theta}{}_{\phi \phi}) \\ &amp;= r^2 \left(- \frac{1}{2} \frac{\partial}{\partial \theta} \sin (2 \theta) + \frac{1}{2} \sin (2 \theta) \cot \theta\right) \\ &amp;= r^2 \left(- \cos (2 \theta) + \sin \theta \cos \theta \frac{\cos \theta}{\sin \theta}\right) \\ &amp;= r^2 \left(- (\cos^2 \theta - \sin^2 \theta) + \cos^2 \theta\right) \\ &amp;= r^2 \sin^2 \theta. \\ \end{align*} </annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="katex-html" aria-hidden="true"><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height:14.6411em;vertical-align:-7.0706em;"></span><span class="mord"><span class="mtable"><span class="col-align-r"><span class="vlist-t vlist-t2"><span class="vlist-r"><span &amp; R_{\theta \theta \theta \phi} &amp;= 0, &amp; R_{\theta \theta \phi \theta} &amp;= 0, &amp; R_{\theta \theta \phi \phi} &amp;= 0, \\ R_{\theta \phi \theta \theta} &amp;= 0, &amp; R_{\theta \phi \theta \phi} &amp;= r^2 \sin^2 \theta, &amp; R_{\theta \phi \phi \theta} &amp;= -r^2 \sin^2 \theta, &amp; R_{\theta \phi \phi \phi} &amp;= 0,\\ R_{\phi \theta \theta \theta} &amp;= 0, &amp; R_{\phi \theta \theta \phi} &amp;= -r^2 \sin^2 \theta, &amp; R_{\phi \theta \phi \theta} &amp;= r^2 \sin^2 \theta, &amp; R_{\phi \theta \phi \phi} &amp;= 0, \\ R_{\phi \phi \theta \theta} &amp;= 0, &amp; R_{\phi \phi \theta \phi} &amp;= 0, &amp; R_{\phi \phi \phi \theta} &amp;= 0, &amp; R_{\phi \phi \phi \phi} &amp;= 0. \end{align*} </annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="katex-html" displaystyle="true"><mrow><mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0.</mn></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr></mtable><annotation encoding="application/x-tex"> \begin{align*} R^{\theta}{}_{\theta \theta \theta} &amp;= 0, &amp; R^{\theta}{}_{\theta \theta \phi} &amp;= -1, &amp; R^{\theta}{}_{\theta \phi \theta} &amp;= 1, &amp; R^{\theta}{}_{\theta \phi \phi} &amp;= 0, \\ R^{\theta}{}_{\phi \theta \theta} &amp;= 0, &amp; R^{\theta}{}_{\phi \theta \phi} &amp;= \sin^2 \theta, &amp; R^{\theta}{}_{\phi \phi \theta} &amp;= - \sin^2 \theta, &amp; R^{\theta}{}_{\phi \phi \phi} &amp;= 0,\\ R^{\phi}{}_{\theta \theta \theta} &amp;= 0, &amp; R^{\phi}{}_{\theta \theta \phi} &amp;= -1, &amp; R^{\phi}{}_{\theta \phi \theta} &amp;= 1, &amp; R^{\phi}{}_{\theta \phi \phi} &amp;= 0, \\ R^{\phi}{}_{\phi \theta \theta} &amp;= 0, &amp; R^{\phi}{}_{\phi \theta \phi} &amp;= \sin^2 \theta, &amp; R^{\phi}{}_{\phi \phi \theta} &amp;= -\sin^2 \theta, &amp; R^{\phi}{}_{\phi \phi \phi} &amp;= 0. \end{align*} \begin{align*} \nabla_{\boldsymbol{s}} \nabla_{\boldsymbol{v}} \boldsymbol{v} &amp;= \boldsymbol{0}, \\ \nabla_{\boldsymbol{s}} \nabla_{\boldsymbol{v}} \boldsymbol{v} - \nabla_{\boldsymbol{v}} \nabla_{\boldsymbol{s}} \boldsymbol{v} + \nabla_{\boldsymbol{v}} \nabla_{\boldsymbol{s}} \boldsymbol{v} &amp;= \boldsymbol{0}, \\ R(\boldsymbol{s}, \boldsymbol{v}) \boldsymbol{v} + \nabla_{\boldsymbol{v}} \nabla_{\boldsymbol{v}} \boldsymbol{s} &amp;= \boldsymbol{0}, \end{align*} </annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="katex-html" aria-hidden="true"><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height:4.5em;vertical-align:-2em;"></span><span class="mord"><span class="mtable"><span class="col-align-r"><span class="vlist-t vlist-t2"><span class="vlist-r"><span class="vlist" style="height:2.5em;"><span style="top:-4.66em;"><span class="pstrut" style="height:3em;"></span><span class="mord"><span class="mord"><span mathvariant="normal">Γ</mi><mi>ρ</mi></msup><msub><mrow></mrow><mrow><mi>γ</mi><mi>α</mi></mrow></msub><mo>−</mo><msup><mi>R</mi><mi>σ</mi></msup><msub><mrow></mrow><mrow><mi>λ</mi><mi>α</mi><mi>ρ</mi></mrow></msub><msup><mi mathvariant="bold-italic">σ</mi></msub></mi><mo>⊗</mo><msup><mi>ϵ</mi><mi>λ</mi></msup><mo>⊗</mo><msup><mi>ϵ</mi><mi>α</mi></msup><mo>⊗</mo><msup><mi>ϵ</mi><mi>β</mi></msup><mo separator="true">,</mo></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr></mtable><annotation encoding="application/x-tex"> \begin{align*} \nabla_{\boldsymbol{e_{\gamma}}} R &amp;= \nabla_{\boldsymbol{e_{\gamma}}} (R^{\sigma}{}_{\lambda \alpha \beta} \boldsymbol{e_{\sigma}} \otimes \epsilon^{\lambda} \otimes \epsilon^{\alpha} \otimes \epsilon^{\beta}) \\ &amp;= \nabla_{\boldsymbol{e_{\gamma}}} (R^{\sigma}{}_{\lambda \alpha \beta}) \boldsymbol{e_{\sigma}} \otimes \epsilon^{\lambda} \otimes \epsilon^{\alpha} \otimes \epsilon^{\beta} + R^{\sigma}{}_{\lambda \alpha \beta} \nabla_{\boldsymbol{e_{\gamma}}} \boldsymbol{e_{\sigma}} \otimes \epsilon^{\lambda} \otimes \epsilon^{\alpha} \otimes \epsilon^{\beta} + R^{\sigma}{}_{\lambda \alpha \beta} \boldsymbol{e_{\sigma}} \otimes \nabla_{\boldsymbol{e_{\gamma}}} \epsilon^{\lambda} \otimes \epsilon^{\alpha} \otimes \epsilon^{\beta} \\ &amp;+ R^{\sigma}{}_{\lambda \alpha \beta} \boldsymbol{e_{\sigma}} \otimes \epsilon^{\lambda} \otimes \nabla_{\boldsymbol{e_{\gamma}}} \epsilon^{\alpha} \otimes \epsilon^{\beta} + R^{\sigma}{}_{\lambda \alpha \beta} \boldsymbol{e_{\sigma}} \otimes \epsilon^{\lambda} \otimes \epsilon^{\alpha} \otimes \nabla_{\boldsymbol{e_{\gamma}}} \epsilon^{\beta} \\ &amp;= R^{\sigma}{}_{\lambda \alpha \beta, \gamma} \boldsymbol{e_{\sigma}} \otimes \epsilon^{\lambda} \otimes \epsilon^{\alpha} \otimes \epsilon^{\beta} + R^{\sigma}{}_{\lambda \alpha \beta} \Gamma^{\rho}{}_{\gamma \sigma} \boldsymbol{e_{\rho}} \otimes \epsilon^{\lambda} \otimes \epsilon^{\alpha} \otimes \epsilon^{\beta} - R^{\sigma}{}_{\lambda \alpha \beta} \Gamma^{\lambda}{}_{\gamma \rho} \boldsymbol{e_{\sigma}} \otimes \epsilon^{\rho} \otimes \epsilon^{\alpha} \otimes \epsilon^{\beta} \\ &amp;- R^{\sigma}{}_{\lambda \alpha \beta} \Gamma^{\alpha}{}_{\gamma \rho} \boldsymbol{e_{\sigma}} \otimes \epsilon^{\lambda} \otimes \epsilon^{\rho} \otimes \epsilon^{\beta} - R^{\sigma}{}_{\lambda \alpha \beta} \Gamma^{\beta}{}_{\gamma \rho} \boldsymbol{e_{\sigma}} \otimes \epsilon^{\lambda} \otimes \epsilon^{\alpha} \otimes \epsilon^{\rho} \\ &amp;= R^{\sigma}{}_{\lambda \alpha \beta, \gamma} \boldsymbol{e_{\sigma}} \otimes \epsilon^{\lambda} \otimes \epsilon^{\alpha} \otimes \epsilon^{\beta} + R^{\rho}{}_{\lambda \alpha \beta} \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\gamma \rho} \boldsymbol{e_{\sigma}} \otimes \epsilon^{\lambda} \otimes \epsilon^{\alpha} \otimes \epsilon^{\beta} - R^{\sigma}{}_{\rho \alpha \beta} \Gamma^{\rho}{}_{\gamma \lambda} \boldsymbol{e_{\sigma}} \otimes \epsilon^{\lambda} \otimes \epsilon^{\alpha} \otimes \epsilon^{\beta} \\ &amp;- R^{\sigma}{}_{\lambda \rho \beta} \Gamma^{\rho}{}_{\gamma \alpha} \boldsymbol{e_{\sigma}} \otimes \epsilon^{\lambda} \otimes \epsilon^{\alpha} \otimes \epsilon^{\beta} - R^{\sigma}{}_{\lambda \alpha \rho} \Gamma^{\rho}{}_{\gamma \beta} \boldsymbol{e_{\sigma}} \otimes \epsilon^{\lambda} \otimes \epsilon^{\alpha} \otimes \epsilon^{\beta} \\ &amp;= (R^{\sigma}{}_{\lambda \alpha \beta, \gamma} + R^{\rho}{}_{\lambda \alpha \beta} \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\gamma \rho} - R^{\sigma}{}_{\rho \alpha \beta} \Gamma^{\rho}{}_{\gamma \lambda} - R^{\sigma}{}_{\lambda \rho \beta} \Gamma^{\rho}{}_{\gamma \alpha} - R^{\sigma}{}_{\lambda \alpha \rho} \Gamma^{\rho}{}_{\gamma \beta}) \boldsymbol{e_{\sigma}} \otimes \epsilon^{\lambda} \otimes \epsilon^{\alpha} \otimes \epsilon^{\beta}, \end{align*} </annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="katex-html" aria-hidden="true"><span class="base"><span class="strut" R^{\sigma}{}_{\lambda \gamma \alpha; \beta} + R^{\sigma}{}_{\lambda \beta \gamma; \alpha} &amp;= \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\beta \lambda, \alpha \gamma} - \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\alpha \lambda, \beta \gamma} \\ &amp;+ \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\alpha \lambda, \gamma \beta} - \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\gamma \lambda, \alpha \beta} \\ &amp;+ \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\gamma \lambda, \beta \alpha} - \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\beta \lambda, \gamma \alpha} \\ &amp;= \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\beta \lambda, \alpha \gamma} - \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\beta \lambda, \gamma \alpha} \\ &amp;+ \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\alpha \lambda, \gamma \beta} - \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\alpha \lambda, \beta \gamma} \\ &amp;+ \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\gamma \lambda, \beta \alpha} - \Gamma^{\sigma}{}_{\gamma \lambda, \alpha \beta} \\ &amp;= 0. \end{align*}
